New Company Registration (Pty) Ltd | Turnkey Launch | JG

Launch your business with a fully compliant Pty Ltd structure. We handle the Name Reservation and MoI filing.

Est. Turnaround: 3-5 Business Days
Total Fee
R 1 250,00

Why Register With JG?

  • 100% CIPC Compliance Guaranteed: We ensure no rejection delays.
  • Includes Name Reservation
  • Income Tax Number Generation
  • Standard MoI (Memorandum of Incorporation)

Process Flow

  1. Submit 4 proposed names & ID copy.
  2. We lodge the Name Reservation.
  3. Once approved, we file the Incorporation (CoR 15.1).
  4. Receive Company Papers + Tax Number.

Ready to Start?

Launch your business officially today. Our team will handle the CIPC administration so you can focus on trading.

Start New Company Registration
